docblock.description: session class is a class to interface with php session variables
session class is a class to interface with php session variables
docblock.long-description: Provides all necessary functions to create, use and destroy php session variables

tag.name: copyright
tag.description: Copyright (c) 2020 University of Illinois Board of Trustees

docblock.long-description: Constructs object, sets session settings, and starts the session

tag.name: param
tag.description: name of the session. Should be unique to application

docblock.description: Returns array of all session variables

tag.name: return
tag.description: associative array of key->value session variables

docblock.long-description: Destroys session variables, clears out cookies and regenerates session id
Sets settings to ensure high level of encryption

docblock.description: db class interacts with mysql database using PDO
db class interacts with mysql database using PDO
docblock.long-description: Provides all necessary functions to connect and run sql queries on the database

tag.name: var
tag.description: enable or disable ssl connection. defaults to false

tag.name: param
tag.description: @host hostname or IP address of mysql server

docblock.description: Destroys db object. Closes mysql database connection

tag.name: param
tag.description: @host hostname or IP address of mysql server

tag.name: param
tag.description: sql query to run on the database

tag.name: return
tag.description: insert id returned from database. 0 otherwise

docblock.description: Builds insert query using associative array

tag.name: param
tag.description: associative array with key being table colume and value being the data

tag.name: return
tag.description: insert id returned from database. 0 otherwise

docblock.description: Runs a non select or insert query on database
Runs sql query for SELECT queries

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns PDO object with the current connection

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns true on success, false otherwise

tag.name: param
tag.description: column name to use in where clause

tag.name: param
tag.description: value column needs to be equal to

tag.name: return

docblock.description: report class generates Excel, PDF, and CSV files using PHPSpreadsheet, https://phpspreadsheet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/

Outputs it using php headers
